mapper.select: SELECT e.EMP_NAME, e.EMP_CODE, dc.DETAIL_CODE_NAME, d.DEPT_NAME, p.POSITION_NAME ,ei.BASE_ADDRESS, ei.DETAIL_ADDRESS, j.HIRE_DATE FROM EMPLOYEE e, WORK_INFO j, DETAIL_CODE dc, DEPARTMENT d, EMPLOYEE_INFO ei, POSITION p WHERE j.JIKJONG_CODE=dc.DETAIL_CODE AND e.EMP_CODE=j.EMP_CODE AND d.DEPT_CODE=e.DEPT_CODE AND e.EMP_CODE=ei.EMP_CODE AND p.POSITION_CODE=e.POSITION_CODE AND e.EMP_CODE=#{empCode}
